statements: DELETE FROM data_backups WHERE backup_size > 1000 AND backup_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM data_backups WHERE backup_location = '/mnt/backups' AND system_maintenance_date > '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM data_backups WHERE backup_name LIKE '%daily_backup%' AND backup_size < 500;
DELETE FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_id = 100 AND task_name = 'Backup Cleanup';
DELETE FROM servers WHERE server_status = false;
DELETE FROM backups WHERE backup_name = 'manual' AND backup_status = 'completed';
DELETE FROM backup_schedule WHERE backup_id IN (SELECT backup_id FROM backups WHERE backup_method = 'incremental');
DELETE FROM backup_schedule WHERE last_run < NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days';
